statement.title: Content
statement.content: Given a prime $p (p<10^8)$,you are to find min{$x^2+y^2$},where $x$ and $y$ belongs to positive integer, so that $(x^2+y^2) \equiv 0$ (mod $p$).

statement.title: Standard Input
statement.content: Every line is a $p$. No more than $10001$ test cases.

statement.title: Standard Output
statement.content: The minimum square sum as described above.

statement.title: Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
2 3 52 18 5
